params.proofDataArray: Data sent along the request to prove its validity

returns._0: attestations Attestations that will be recorded

batchGenerateAttestations(address[],((ui.details: generate multiple attestations at once, to the same destination

buildAttestations(address,((uint256,uint.details: build the attestations from a user request targeting a specific attester. Forwards to the build function of targeted attester

params.proofData: Data sent along the request to prove its validity

returns._0: attestations Attestations that will be recorded

generateAttestations(address,((uint256,u.details: Forward a request to an attester

params.proofData: Data provided to the attester to back the request

userdoc.notice: This is the Front contract of the Proof of Talent protocol Behind a proxy, it routes attestations request to the targeted attester and can perform some actions
